description: This large spider-like monster has an eerie, humanoid face surrounded by a shaggy mane of fur.
name: Phase Spider

description: This immense bird seems to be made of living flame. It spreads its wings and gives vent to a musical cry as it takes to the air.
name: Phoenix
spell_like_abilities: (CL 18th)Constant-detect magic, detect poison, see invisibilityAt will-continual flame, cure critical wounds, greater dispel magic, remove curse, wall of fire3/day-fire storm (DC 24), greater restoration, heal, mass cure critical wounds, quickened wall of fire

name: Pit Fiend
spell_like_abilities: (CL 18th)At will-blasphemy (DC 25), create undead, fireball (DC 21), greater dispel magic, greater teleport (self plus 50 lbs. of objects only), greater scrying (DC 25), invisibility, magic circle against good, mass hold monster (DC 27), persistent image (DC 23), power word stun, scorching ray, trap the soul (DC 26), unholy aura (DC 26), wall of fire3/day-quickened fireball (DC 21)1/day-meteor swarm, summon (level 9, any 1 CR 19 or lower devil, 100%)1/year-wish

description: This tiny, whimsical-looking humanoid darts about swiftly on wildly colored gossamer wings.
name: Pixie
spell_like_abilities: (CL 8th)Constant-detect chaos, detect evil, detect good, detect law1/day-dancing lights, detect thoughts (DC 15), dispel magic, entangle (DC 14), lesser confusion (DC 14), permanent image (DC 19; visual and auditory elements only), shield

description: This housecat-sized miniature dragon has fine scales, sharp horns, wicked little teeth, and a tail tipped with a barbed stinger.
name: Pseudodragon

description: This enormous worm is covered with dark purple plates of chitinous armor. Its giant, tooth-filled mouth is the size of an ox.
name: Purple Worm
special_attacks: swallow whole (4d8+18 bludgeoning damage, AC 21, 20 hp)

description: This filthy rat is the size of a small dog. It has a coat of coarse fur, a long and scabby tail, and two glittering eyes.
name: Dire Rat

description: An immense centipede-like beast erupts from the snow, rows of chitinous plates on its back glowing red-hot.
name: Remorhaz
special_attacks: heat, swallow whole (2d6+9 plus 8d6 fire, AC 15, hp 9)

description: This rhinoceros has a low-slung head with twisted ears that lie back along its neck.
name: Rhinoceros

description: This large rhinoceros has a shaggy pelt of long, brown fur and a row of immense horns on its snout and brow.
name: Woolly Rhinoceros

description: A huge eye opens in this conical creature's front, just above a toothy mouth. Long strands of fibrous material whip from its sides.
name: Roper

description: This insectile monster has four legs, a strange propeller-shaped protrusion at the end of its tail, and two long, feathery antennae.
name: Rust Monster

description: This scaly humanoid has a long, fish-like tail. Its arms and legs end in webbed claws, and its piscine head features a toothy maw.
name: Sahuagin

description: This handsome, grinning man has the furry legs of a goat and a set of curling ram horns extending from his temples.
name: Satyr
spell_like_abilities: (CL 8th)At will-charm person (DC 15), dancing lights, ghost sound (DC 14), sleep (DC 15), suggestion (DC 17)1/day-fear (DC 18), summon nature's ally III

description: The sixteen-foot-long scorpion scrabbles forward, ferocious claws raised in challenge, stingered tail arched over its back.
name: Giant Scorpion

description: Hair like rotting seaweed drapes this ancient witch. Loose, algae-colored skin sags off her starved frame.
name: Sea Hag

description: Spine-frilled neck arching up from the water like a snake ready to strike, this ship-sized serpent hisses a challenge.
name: Sea Serpent
special_attacks: capsize, constrict (3d6+18), swallow whole (4d8+18 bludgeoning damage, AC 18, hp 18)

description: Barely seen out of the corner of the eye, this wisp of shadow is vaguely humanoid in outline and writhes with unholy life.
name: Shadow

description: This shadowy figure sways and moves with an erratic grace, as if lit by an unseen fire.
name: Greater Shadow
special_attacks: create spawn (as per shadow), strength damage

description: A mass of tangled vines and dripping slime rises on two trunk-like legs, reeking of rot and freshly turned earth.
name: Shambling Mound

description: This blue shark's fins slice through the water, its black eyes rolling and its gaping jaws showing countless teeth.
name: Shark

description: Large as a dragon, this shark's jaws open to reveal a cavernous, tooth-lined gullet capable of swallowing a horse whole.
name: Dire Shark

description: This dog-sized lizard has two horns, one on either side of its head, and green scales that crackle with sparks of lightning.
name: Shocker Lizard

description: This immense mound of black slime thunders forward, eyes and mouths and even stranger things forming in its heaving bulk.
name: Shoggoth
special_attacks: constrict (3d6+15), maddening cacophony, engulf (4d6+22 bludgeoning damage plus 8d6 acid damage, AC 19, hp 33), trample (4d8+15, DC 36)

description: This armored skeleton stands in a battle-ready pose, its weapon held high as cold blue light shines in its eye sockets.
name: Skeletal Champion

description: This massive, gray-brown slug leaves a viscous trail of slime in its wake as a long rasping tongue tastes the air for prey.
name: Giant Slug

description: This large snake has a thick, muscular body and dull green scales decorated with dirty brown stripes.
name: Constrictor Snake

description: This brightly colored snake assumes an aggressive posture, its hissing mouth open to display its fangs.
name: Venomous Snake

description: This translucent, ghostly figure fades into view from the damp mist, its face distorted by wrath into a hideous mask.
name: Spectre
special_attacks: create spawn, energy drain (2 levels, DC 16)

description: This creature has the body of a lion, the wings of a falcon, and the head and torso of a beautiful human woman.
name: Sphinx
spell_like_abilities: (CL 12th)Constant-comprehend languages, detect magic, read magic, see invisibility3/day-clairaudience/clairvoyance1/day-dispel magic, locate object, remove curse, legend lore1/week-any one of the following (all symbols last for 1 week maximum): symbol of fear (DC 20), symbol of pain (DC 19), symbol of persuasion (DC 20), symbol of sleep (DC 19), symbol of stunning (DC 21)

description: A spider the size of a man crawls silently from the depths of its funnel-shaped web.
name: Giant Spider

description: This insectoid creature has two pairs of bat wings, a tangle of thin legs, and a needle-sharp proboscis.
name: Stirge

description: This bald gnome has rocky gray skin and a wiry physique. Its pale eyes are overly large and expressive.
name: Svirfneblin
special_attacks: favored enemy (dwarf +2), +1 to attack vs. dwarven and reptilian humanoids
spell_like_abilities: (CL 1st)Constant-nondetection1/day-blindness/deafness (DC 12), blur, disguise self

description: A writhing carpet of ants seethes over the ground, consuming everything in its path.
name: Army Ant Swarm

description: Hundreds of high-pitched squeaks fill the air as a mass of small, carnivorous bats surges forth, all of them hungry for blood.
name: Bat Swarm

description: A writhing mass of legs and poisonous pincers swarms across the ground in a deadly, undulating wave.
name: Centipede Swarm

description: A writhing mass of clacking shells and snapping pincers rushes from the surf, their spider-like legs twitching across the sand.
name: Crab Swarm

description: A mass of wriggling black creatures each the size of a man's finger stirs the stagnant water before enveloping its victim.
name: Leech Swarm

description: A squirming, roiling mass of squeaking rats draws closer, teeth flashing and claws scratching everything in its path.
name: Rat Swarm

description: An awful, scuttling mass of legs and mandibles scrambles forward out of the darkness.
name: Spider Swarm

description: A low, ominous buzz announces the arrival of a mass of many thousands of angry, stinging wasps.
name: Wasp Swarm

description: This immense reptilian beast towers over the surroundings like a dinosaur, all teeth and horns and claws and thrashing spiked tail.
name: Tarrasque
special_attacks: rush, spines, swallow whole (6d6+22 plus 6d6 acid, AC 27, hp 52)

description: Black feathers cover this crow-headed humanoid, and its hands and legs end in powerful talons.
name: Tengu

description: This powerful feline predator moves with a deadly grace, its reddish-orange fur slashed with black stripes.
name: Tiger

description: This large tiger grumbles a warning as it crouches. Two saber-like fangs jut downward from its powerful jaws.
name: Dire Tiger

description: This animated tree's bark is knotted into vaguely humanoid features, with branches for arms and roots for legs.
name: Treant

description: This humanoid's scaly hide is dull gray. Its frame resembles that of a cave lizard, with a long tail and crests on its head and back.
name: Troglodyte

description: This tall creature has rough, green hide. Its hands end in claws, and its bestial face has a hideous, tusked underbite.
name: Troll

description: This magnificent beast looks like a white horse, but with a goat's beard and a single long ivory horn on its brow.
name: Unicorn
spell_like_abilities: (CL 9th)At will-detect evil (as free action), light3/day-cure light wounds1/day-cure moderate wounds, greater teleport (within its forest territory), neutralize poison (DC 21)

description: This alluring, raven-haired beauty casually wipes a trickle of blood from a pale cheek, then smiles to reveal needle-sharp fangs.
name: Vampire
special_attacks: blood drain, children of the night, create spawn, dominate (DC 22), energy drain (2 levels, DC 22)

description: Short, thin, and green, this small humanoid wields a spear. Tendrils of fungus dangle from its arms, midsection, and legs.
name: Vegepygmy

description: This mushroom grows from a bed of tentacular roots. Deep violet tendrils slither out of the dozens of fissures in its pointed cap.
name: Violet Fungus

description: This horse-sized wasp is covered in yellow and black vertical stripes-its stinger is the size of a sword and drips with venom.
name: Giant Wasp

description: The flesh of this walking corpse is rotting and putrid, its body skeletal in places and its eye sockets glowing with red light.
name: Wight
special_attacks: create spawn, energy drain (1 level, DC 14)

description: This faintly glowing ball of light bobs gently in the air, the nebulous image of what might be a skull visible somewhere in its depths.
name: Will-o'-Wisp

description: This powerful canine watches its prey with piercing yellow eyes, darting its tongue across sharp white teeth.
name: Wolf

description: This immense black wolf is the size of a horse, its fangs as large and sharp as knives.
name: Dire Wolf

description: This stocky, muscular mammal is the size of a badger, its snarling lips revealing a mouth full of yellow teeth.
name: Wolverine

description: This terrible wolverine is as large as a bear, its jaws and claws oversized and brutal, its eyes dark and filled with rage.
name: Dire Wolverine

description: This unusually large wolf has an evil, almost intelligent light shining in its deep red eyes.
name: Worg

description: This bear-sized wolf has white fur and a rime of frost around its muzzle. Its eyes are pale blue, almost white in color.
name: Winter Wolf Worg
special_attacks: breath weapon (every 1d4 rounds, 15-ft. cone, 6d6 cold damage, Reflex half DC 17)

description: This ghostly creature is little more than a dark shape with two flickering pinpoints of light where its eyes should be.
name: Wraith

description: A dark blue dragon, its wings immense and its tail tipped with a hooked stinger, lands on two taloned feet and roars a challenge.
name: Wyvern

description: Coiling around several human skeletons, this wet green plant's sickly flowers smoke with a nasty yellow vapor.
name: Yellow Musk Creeper
special_attacks: create yellow musk zombie, pollen spray

description: This creature stands like a man, yet is half again the height of most men and covered with a coat of thick white fur.
name: Yeti
special_attacks: frightful gaze, rend (2 claws, 1d6+6 plus 1d6 cold)
